entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - EDGAR/transform

[DQC.US.0109.9570] The concept us-gaap:ConcentrationRiskPercentage1 with value 0.84 is used with the ConcentrationRiskByBenchmarkAxis with a benchmark of us-gaap:AccountsReceivableMember. The risk associated with this benchmark of us-gaap:SupplierConcentrationRiskMember is not approproiate to this benchmark. Consider using an extension risk or one of the risks associated with this banch mark such as CreditConcentrationRiskMember, GeographicConcentrationRiskMember, CustomerConcentrationRiskMember
The properties of this us-gaap:ConcentrationRiskPercentage1 fact are:
Period :2023-01-01 to 2023-03-31 Dimensions : us-gaap:ConcentrationRiskByTypeAxis=us-gaap:SupplierConcentrationRiskMember, srt:MajorCustomersAxis=MINM:TwoCompaniesMember, us-gaap:ConcentrationRiskByBenchmarkAxis=us-gaap:AccountsReceivableMember Unit : pure
Rule Element Id:9570 Rule version: 26.0.9 - miniminc_10q.htm 2739

[DQC.US.0109.9570] The concept us-gaap:ConcentrationRiskPercentage1 with value 1 is used with the ConcentrationRiskByBenchmarkAxis with a benchmark of us-gaap:AccountsReceivableMember. The risk associated with this benchmark of us-gaap:SupplierConcentrationRiskMember is not approproiate to this benchmark.
